title: Add safety checks in `index_add`/`scatter_add`
body_html:
Consider this snippet:

a = torch.ones(5)
i = torch.ones(5)
a.index_add_(0, i, a)

Idk if we support repeated indices in i (we should), but we definitely shouldn't support adding to itself, as the result depends on the order of processing the additions.

body:
Consider this snippet:
```python
a = torch.ones(5)
i = torch.ones(5)
a.index_add_(0, i, a)
```
Idk if we support repeated indices in `i` (we should), but we definitely shouldn't support adding to itself, as the result depends on the order of processing the additions.
